title: Benefits Specialist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Cottage Health
Interview Descriptions: Started with a 30 minute phone interview with the recruiter then in-person interview with multiple people over 5 hours. Not enough breaks between interviewees. Stated this to recruiter to improve process.
Interview Questions: Why did you leave your last position?

title: Clinical Research Coordinator I Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. I interviewed at Cottage Health in Apr 2023
Interview Descriptions: This is for the CHRI and cottage recruiters. The process took very long... unresponsive even though they asked to follow up with them through email after the interview. 3 emails were ignored. Seems very disorganized and lack of respect for applicants' time. From the interview date, the rejection email was 2.5 months later (and after 3 emails in the 1.5 months after the interview without any update or reply).
Interview Questions: Do you have experience with IRB or submissions?

title: Instructional Designer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Cottage Health
Interview Descriptions: Interview with a panel and interview with the manager. You will have to create a presentation to teach the panel something during the interview. This will only be 5-10 mins long. Great team.
Interview Questions: How would you handle a ticket that was routed to you by accident?

title: Medical Laboratory Scientist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Cottage Health in May 2022
Interview Descriptions: I received a call late in the day.  I returned the call and spoke with the manager for about 20 minutes.  Had 2 interviews.  Then absolutely no follow-up. I reached out, but still no response back.
Interview Questions: Discuss something new you had to complete, how did you go about completing the task?

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Cottage Health
Interview Descriptions: Email introduction followed by long phone interview. There was a follow up call expressing interest and to answer any questions. Then an in person tour to meet potential co-workers and a long group interview. However, there was a internal candidate applying as well who got the offer. I was recommended for a different admin position.
Interview Questions: Why I was interested in working at Cottage?

title: Pharmacy Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Cottage Health
Interview Descriptions: Multiple people interviewed me including pharmacist and technician. Lasted one hour and include round of questions and then discussion time for me to ask questions. Ended with a tour of pharmacy and department
Interview Questions: Define role of clinical pharmacist

title: Executive Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Cottage Health
Interview Descriptions:
I would not recommended applying here if you have several years of valuable C-Suite support experience.
I applied with paralleled experience to job description, within 30 minutes received a generic decline email from D.
Interview Questions: No chance to interview or for evaluation.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Cottage Health
Interview Descriptions: Professional, friendly. Manager was easy to talk explained all policies and gave me plenty of time to ask questions. Did not discuss pay in interview however. Was a panel interview.
Interview Questions: How do you get organized for your day at work

title: Paralegal Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Cottage Health
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was smooth and HR was responsive, even with follow up questions about why I was not offered a position.  Both interviewers were polite and respectful of my time
Interview Questions: What types of matters did you handle in your previous position?

title: Unit Care Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Cottage Health
Interview Descriptions: Took about 1 week. I applied online and received interview placement call 3 days later.  Communication throughout the entire process was excellent.  Heard back the morning after the interview with a job offer.
Interview Questions:
1. Tell us about yourself.
2. What do you do when you make a mistake?
3. Describe a time when you've made an impact.
4. Describe a time when you've gone above and beyond.
5. Were you ever in a committee of some sort where you've faced a problem? How did you approach it?
6. How do you approach a coworker who is struggling?
7. What is something new that you can bring to this workplace?

title: Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Cottage Health (Santa Barbara, CA) in Oct 2020
Interview Descriptions: Applied online, did 8 virtual / phone interviews and 1 in person interview over a period of 90 days with different levels of management. (Burial meetings took place due to COVID-19)
Interview Questions: Name a time when you dealt with a difficult situation at work.

title: Respiratory Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Cottage Health
Interview Descriptions: Most of the interview is to get an idea of your personality and how you deal with adverse situations.  Can you get along with others? Gave examples of specific clinical scenarios that required you to think about ethics.
Interview Questions: Name a time when you encounterd a hostile co worker and how did you deal with it?

title: Emergency Department Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Cottage Health (Santa Barbara, CA) in Apr 2019
Interview Descriptions: Call from the registered nurse of the department followed by an interview appointment. Time span of a week between application and interview. The nurse was very friendly and willing to answer any questions
Interview Questions: Why do you think you belong in this position?

title: ER SCRIBE Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Cottage Health (Santa Barbara, CA) in Jul 2017
Interview Descriptions: I applied and heard back approximately 1 or 1.5 months later from the chief scribe. She called for a phone conversation to basically make sure we were on the same page about the job before the in-person interview (how long are you planning on working here for, what are your pay expectations, hour expectations, etc) and then I went in for the in-person interview at the hospital a few days later.  The room was super hard to find, btw.  Be prepared to talk about your GPA.
Interview Questions: Whats something you're good at?

title: Program Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Cottage Health (Santa Barbara, CA) in Jun 2017
Interview Descriptions: Submitted resume online, called several days later by hiring manager. Had face to face interviews with hiring manager and 2 other members of team. Obviously some strange team dynamics going on as both team members were critical of their boss. Heard back a week later that I was not selected.  The letter from HR referenced another position that I hadn’t even applied to. Strange interviews, strange people and strange interaction with recruiting team
Interview Questions: Describe stages of programs previously managed

title: Register Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Cottage Health (Santa Barbara, CA)
Interview Descriptions: Interview was initially conducted by phone as I was relocating from out of state.  My second interview was in person with 2 staff and manager.  Cottage paid for my trip (airfare, hotel, rental car) to CA for interview which was nice; often times people just want a warm body and don't put much thought into who they hire just as long as you're a nurse.
Interview Questions: Typical interview questions... how do you handle stress, what is your experience, etc.

title: Concierge Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Cottage Health (Santa Barbara, CA) in Feb 2017
Interview Descriptions: Interview with the manager followed by a panel interview with potential coworkers asking questions related to the job as well as questions that could potentially interfere with your ability to do the job.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in the next couple of years? Do you plan to go back to school?

title: Leave of Absence Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Cottage Health (Santa Barbara, CA) in Oct 2016
Interview Descriptions: very laid back, great experience with recruitment and the managers. made you feel at ease and did not do badgering type questions. Provided a tour of the facility and let me meet with a lot of people in the organization.
Interview Questions: What are things I find important about a employer?

title: Clinical Nurse II Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Cottage Health (Santa Barbara, CA)
Interview Descriptions: Interview process includes a panel interview with supervisors and a peer panel interview.  The peer interview panel was a good opportunity to meet nursing leadership of the unit I was applying to.
Interview Questions: What are your long term goals

title: Pharmacy Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Cottage Health (Santa Barbara, CA) in Jun 2014
Interview Descriptions: Initial interview which gave me a tour of the facility, then another interview with peers who all asked me different questions to which I had to answer. The peers consisted of pharmacy technicians and pharmacists who all work there.
Interview Questions: What are your strengths and weaknesses?

title: Project Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Cottage Health (Santa Barbara, CA) in May 2012
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview first with the hiring manager, then meet and greet with dept employees and direct supervisor interview.
Interview Questions: Goals in 5yrs and 10yrs
